definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Nu 7:84 bowl, bason (prop. vessel for throwing or tossing a liquid); ´[[מ]] Nu 7:13 + 13 t., pl. [[מִזְרָקִים]] Zec 14:20, cstr. [[מִזְרְקֵי]] Nu 7:84 + 2 t., [[מִזְרָקוֹת]] Ne 7:70 + 9 t., [[מִזְרָקׂת]] Ex 38:3 + 2 t., sf. [[מִזְרְקׂתָיו]] Ex 27:3; —
elsewh. for use in ritual of sacrifice:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: for use at altar Ex 27:3, Ex 38:3, Nu 4:14 (all P), 1Ki 7:40, 1Ki 7:45, Je 52:18, Zec 9:15, Zec 14:20.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: given by the princes full of flour mingled with oil for a [[מנחה]] Nu 7:13, Nu 7:19, Nu 7:25, Nu 7:31, Nu 7:37, Nu 7:43, Nu 7:49, Nu 7:55, Nu 7:61, Nu 7:67, Nu 7:73, Nu 7:79, Nu 7:84, Nu 7:85 (P).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: golden basons for use in the temple 1Ki 7:50, 2Ki 12:14, 2Ki 25:15, 1Ch 28:17, 2Ch 4:8, 2Ch 4:11, 2Ch 4:22, Je 52:19.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: golden basons for the second temple Ne 7:70.
